original_title: Der Film von der Königin Luise - 2. Abteilung: Aus Preußens schwerer Zeit
overview: French revolutionaries had swept into Prussia to wreak havoc, and now Napoleon marches in to inflict sad defeats on the Queen's troops, in the conflict between 1806 and 1807.
title: Der Film von der Königin Luise - 2. Abteilung: Aus Preußens schwerer Zeit
